author.name: Guillemette de Ventadour
author.description: A whimsical troubadour from Occitania, who cherishes the company of nature's gentle creatures. She often includes metaphors of goats, dogs, rabbits, and snails in her poetry. Her writing style is terse.

newsMedieval:
Of Neal, the YouTube's herald fine,
Who treads 'mong creators, merry and bright,
And woos every advertiser 'neath the sun's light,
His quest to win viewers of short tales entwined.

A strife amongst Democrats dost rise,
On debt, they fault President Biden's sway,
Like Bowman of New York, who cries foul play,
They say too much, he hath given away.

Volkswagen, with a beast of former years,
Doth bring back life to their fortunes dear,
A stout old SUV, they make it clear,
To win over the hearts of these lands, they steer.

feedItems.title: The CEO of YouTube Has a Plan to Win Over Anyone Watching TV
feedItems.description: Neal Mohan goofs around with creators and woos advertisers to the platform’s short videos and TV offerings.

feedItems.title: Ahead of Debt Deal, Some Democrats Fault Biden
feedItems.description: Lawmakers including Rep. Jamaal Bowman of New York say the president has given too much away.

feedItems.title: Volkswagen Bets an Old SUV Can Help It Win Over Americans
feedItems.description: After decades of trying to sell German engineering to Americans only to end up with a tiny slice of the world’s most profitable car market, Volkswagen has a new strategy: Revive a once-beloved brand that hasn’t produced cars since 1980.

author.name: Brother Arnulfus
author.description: A Benedictine monk who doth write devotional poems in Ænglish, praising God and the saints. His poems are often humorous, short, and satirical. They often contain metaphors of alcohol, especially wine or ale.

newsMedieval:
Of Chinese merchants sly and wise,
A murky Wind doth cloud our eyes,
No more shall foreign souls perceive,
Their shopping trends and images they leave.

A cunning ploy, these modern spies,
To track their spouse and sneak, descry:
"What hath he at the midday Inn?"
A question fraught with secret sin.

Now Alo Yoga shines, ascends,
With garments sleek, their game transcends,
As saints and sinners garbed alike,
Defeat’st the Nike and Lulu in the fight.

feedItems.title: A Chinese Alternative to Bloomberg Terminals Quietly Limits Information Overseas
feedItems.description: E-commerce shopping trends and satellite images are no longer available to foreign users of Wind, clouding their view of the world’s second-largest economy.

feedItems.title: Is It OK to Track Your Spouse's Location?
feedItems.description: Partners who share their whereabouts can find themselves having to explain: “What was he doing at a hotel in the middle of the day?”

feedItems.title: Alo Yoga Is Beating Lululemon at Its Own Game
feedItems.description: Models, pop superstars and all-star athletes wear its sleek workout clothes, paying homage in “sanctuaries.” How the Alo faithful took on Nike and Lululemon.

author.name: Æthelred the Skald
author.description: A Norse poet who doth regale his audience with tales of gods and heroes, praising their might and prowess. He references Norse mythology and history in his poems. He is known for metaphors involving the sea and the weather and weaponry.

newsMedieval:
In ancient halls of Lazard's keep
A new chieftain, named Orszag, doth sweep
The former aid of Obama's rule
Now wields the bank's almighty tool

A tempest rising, wild fire's dread
Dismays State Farm, their fear widespread
In golden sun, they cease to trade
Defending homes from the blazes made

The seër's craft, of artful mind
In Wall Street's realm, these powers entwined
Yet wise men claim, this might be not
A bubble formed, but fate's own plot

feedItems.title: Lazard named Peter Orszag as its next CEO, putting the former Obama administration official at the investment bank's helm.
feedItems.description: Lazard named Peter Orszag as its next CEO, putting the former Obama administration official at the investment bank’s helm.

feedItems.title: State Farm is stopping the sale of new home-insurance policies in California because of wildfire risk and rapid inflation in construction costs.
feedItems.description: State Farm is stopping the sale of new home-insurance policies in California because of wildfire risk and rapid inflation in construction costs.

feedItems.title: The rise of generative artificial intelligence has created a frenzy on Wall Street, but investors and strategists say the rush to profit from the new technology isn't necessarily a bubble.
feedItems.description: The rise of generative artificial intelligence has created a frenzy on Wall Street, but investors and strategists say the rush to profit from the new technology isn’t necessarily a bubble.

author.name: Conchobar mac Dubhthach
author.description: An Irish bard of yore, who weaves dulcet melodies that capture hearts with tender love songs. With a quill dipped in courtly love, he pens metaphors of devotion, igniting the flames of passion in every soul who hears his verse.

newsMedieval:
In the land of the S&P, Dow and Nasdaq high,
On a merry Friday, as stocks sored to the sky,
With gains of percentages, they took flight for the week,
With tech-heavy Nasdaq, 2.5% did peak.

In a twist of fate, as May did unfold,
Consumers in the land of the U.S. grew bold,
Their spending and inflation, did briskly ascend,
And to the Fed, a dilemma, the rates may portend.

And now in the realm of the fair Texas state,
A trial looms near, for misdeeds of late,
Proceedings against the Attorney General Paxton,
The gavel resounds, as impeachment starts waxin'.

feedItems.title: U.S. stocks climbed Friday, with the Nasdaq, S&P 500 and Dow gaining 2.2%, 1.3% and 1%, respectively. The tech-heavy Nasdaq rose 2.5% for the week.
feedItems.description: U.S. stocks climbed Friday, with the Nasdaq, S&P 500 and Dow gaining 2.2%, 1.3% and 1%, respectively. The tech-heavy Nasdaq rose 2.5% for the week.

feedItems.title: Consumers in the U.S. increased their spending sharply last month and inflation accelerated, fresh data showed Friday, potentially complicating the Federal Reserve's debate on whether to raise interest rates again in June.
feedItems.description: Consumers in the U.S. increased their spending sharply last month and inflation accelerated, fresh data showed Friday, potentially complicating the Federal Reserve’s debate on whether to raise interest rates again in June.

feedItems.title: State lawmakers are expected to begin impeachment proceedings against Texas Attorney General Paxton.
feedItems.description: State lawmakers are expected to begin impeachment proceedings against Texas Attorney General Paxton.
